samples.question: Have you ever bought shoes online?
samples.transcript: I actually have, like, I bought like a pair of British Hunter when the new product was released in 2017. you know, at first everything seemed fine and good, but then when I received the package, it turns out that my, I, my shoes did not fit me and it was too tight and all because I did not, pick the right food size. So, I mean, it was not a, it was not a pleasant experience for me. So. So I would have to be more careful next time How much money do you usually spend on shoes so because like they are not my cup of tea so I have like a very limited budget for them Like roughly about 1 to 2 million Vietnam dong for a pair of good sneakers and maybe less than a million for the sandals And of course I have to wait for the sales season to come to wrap me up a pair too Okay, what do you prefer, fashionable shoes or comfortable shoes? Okay, so as I mentioned earlier, I opt for comfort. So, you know, like trendy shoes cannot have my, capture my attention. And, you know, like what is the point of like wearing a good looking shoes when you, your feet are aching and hurting, you know.

samples.question: What is your opinion on this?
samples.transcript: Okay, this may sound weird, but I agree with them. Okay, call me old-fashioned or whatever, but I think that life back then was so much easier than it is now. You know, back then, before, we lived closely together. We blended in with the nature, you know, living on the hill next to a farm, the river. Everything was so serene, compared to the society now. You know, like, with the, introduction of technology or the integration of industrialization, everything just so hectic and we had barely had a room to breathe.

samples.question: Why do people often miss their childhood?
samples.transcript: Personally I think like, there are always two sides of a story. Not everyone growing up like, you know, reminiscing about their precious childhood. You know, some may grow up with like, emotional scars while developing. So, but the only one thing that they all comes back for is the void that they are having now. For example, like, you know, like the, Fun family reunion in Ted's holiday, like the lucky money you get for Ted, or like the first love kiss under the rain, and the list goes on. You know, all of those precious moments like imprinted on their mind forever to remind them of the time that they were happy as best.

samples.question: So how do people record their good memories?
samples.transcript: There is a lot of means, I will say. The most common one would be pictures. You know, people tend to take pictures, Polaroids, or keeping precious moments in, like, photographs so they can have something to look back at. And, you know, and of course, in forms of, like, pictures, people can share it online to the social media with their friends in a vibrant and realistic way so that everyone can visualize what the scenery or the view is about. That is the end of the test. Thank you.

samples.question: Do you have a lot of close friends?
samples.transcript: I would not say close, but I have many friends right now at the moment. I would say my closest friend is my brother. And I have another friend too, but we are not that close together.

samples.question: How often do you send text messages to people?
samples.transcript: I rather call people actually because texting, you cannot send emotions based on text. It really matters to me. samples.question: Do you think journeys have become easier due to the use of navigation apps?
samples.transcript: It has become really easier. Obviously I use it a lot. Like, for example, coming to every place, it can really help. But unfortunately, one of the problems of taking navigation from the app or something, it makes you do not remember the addresses. And if you wanted to go to the same place again, you would need to use a navigation again. You would not remember any of the, you would not remember any of the, addresses or the ways.
